title: Project-Based Content Analysis Course for Strengthening HRD Professionals’ Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational HRD (Human Resource Development) theory and at least 3 years of practical experience
context.additional_context: A course where learners internalize core HRD professional competencies (e.g., content analysis, digital learning solution design) required in actual corporate environments through project execution.

learning_goals: By analyzing 50 HRD-related online job postings, learners can derive at least three core required competencies (knowledge/skills/responsibilities)
Based on analysis results, learners can create and submit a PBL-style corporate-customized training solution proposal
Learners can present at least two content design plans utilizing Learning Management Systems (LMS) and educational technology tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
